sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TrendingProducts } from '../models/trendingProducts'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { trendingProducts: TrendingProducts[] = [ { banerimage: 'Baner/Baner_Mobile.png', category: { categoryId: 0, category: 'electronics', subCategory: 'mobiles' } }, { banerimage: 'Baner/Baner_Laptop.png', category: { categoryId: 1, category: 'electronics', subCategory: 'laptops' } }, { banerimage: '../../assets/Images/Baner/Baner_Chair.png', category: { categoryId: 2, category: 'furniture', subCategory: 'chair' } }, ] ngOnInit(): void { } }
